れいわ舩後議員、初の国会質問…秘書が代読も初

07 Nov 2019, 12:15



参院文教科学委員会で代読する男性（手前）と共に初質問に臨む、れいわ新選組の舩後靖彦参院議員（手前から２人目）（７日午後４時４７分、国会で）＝米山要撮影

　筋萎縮（いしゅく）性側索硬化症（ＡＬＳ）を患うれいわ新選組の舩後（ふなご）靖彦参院議員が７日、初の国会質問に臨んだ。発症当時を振り返り、「強く生きようとする意志を持てば、私が国会議員になれたように自らの夢・目標を実現できる」と訴えた。
　参院文教科学委員会で質問した舩後氏は冒頭、パソコンによる電子音声で「新人議員として未熟だが、皆様の力を借りながら精いっぱい取り組む」と抱負を述べた。その後は秘書が質問を代読した。参院によると、秘書による代読は初めて。質問では障害の有無にかかわらず共に学ぶ「インクルーシブ教育」などについて、政府の取り組みをただした。
　萩生田文部科学相の答弁の後、事前に用意していなかった再質問も行った。舩後氏が文字盤の文字を目の動きで示し、代読する文書を作成する形で行われた。
　２５分の予定だった質問時間は約４５分に。舩後氏は委員会終了後、介助者を通じ、「２０分も超過したので今後改善したい」と記者団に述べた。

Mr. Reiwa, member of the Diet, the first Diet question ...

07 Nov 2019, 12:15



Takeshi Yoneyama, a member of the Rei Shinsengumi Senkai Yasuhiko (second from the front) (4:47 pm on the 7th)

On the 7th, a member of the House of Representatives Shingo Funago, who is suffering from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), asked the first Diet question. Looking back at the time of the onset, he said, “If I have the will to live strongly, I can realize my dreams and goals as if I became a member of the Diet.”
At the beginning, Mr. Togo, who asked a question at the Senate Bunkyo Science Committee, expressed his aspirations with an electronic voice on a personal computer, "I am immature as a new member of the Diet, but I will do my best with the help of everyone." The secretary then read the question. According to the Senate, this is the first time for a secretary to read. The questions addressed the government's efforts on “inclusive education,” which can be studied together with or without disabilities.
の 後 After the answer from Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, I asked a question that was not prepared in advance. It was done in the form of Mr. Togo showing the letters on the dial with his eyes and creating a document to read.
The question time, which was scheduled for 25 minutes, is now about 45 minutes. Mr. Togo told the reporters, “After 20 minutes, I would like to improve,” he said.
